resources.string: Add destinations so you can tap and go
Add your most frequent places, such as home, work…
Show the name to the driver
Private location: the driver won\'t know that this location is your %1$s
You\'re about to delete one of your favorite places
You\'re about to leave this screen without saving the changes. Are you sure?
We couldn\'t retrieve your suggested location
We couldn\'t retrieve your favorite info
We couldn\'t remove favorite, try again
We couldn\'t create favorite, try again
We couldn\'t update favorite, try again
Hmm, it seems something went wrong with your request.
There are no drivers near you right now
What do you want to do?
The driver arrived a while ago and couldn\'t find you
Share the best way of getting around the city.
Heard about Cabify? It\'s the best way to get around the city. Download the app at https://cabify.com
When your friends have registered and made their first journey, you\'ll receive discounts for your next rides.
Invite your friends to discover this great way of getting around the city...
Invite your friends and travel for less
Add codes and ride for less
Do you have a discount code? Enter it and ride for less.
This promotion has already been used
Ride using your balance, payment will be taken from here.
You need to grant location permissions to use the app
A new journey has begun, do you want to see it now?
You need to tell us where the pick up point is
Hello! Follow my journey with Cabify
You may be charged the minimum journey price for this cancellation.
Something went wrong creating your journey
%1$s, currently Cabify is not available in this area.
Tolls may apply on this route
Something went wrong with your request
Say why you need to make the journey.\nFor example: work lunch.
Wherever you’re going, we’re ready to take you.
So simple! We suggest your usual destinations.
You’ll always see the price before ordering.
Your journey to %1$s, for %2$s, is reserved.
%1$s, you can see your reservation info in the \'Journeys\' tab. Once we\'ve assigned a driver, you\'ll be able to see their details.
You can check your reservation in the \'Journeys\' section. Once we\'ve assigned you a driver you\'ll be able to see their details.
Cancel your reservation or end your journey before closing Movo
Are you sure you want to cancel?
As your driver is already on the way to the pick up point, cancelling will incur a charge.

string-array.name: chat_suggested_messages
string-array.item: Wait for me, I\'m going out.

resources.string: The answer you need is probably here
Set up the app how you want it
All tracked events are shown here
Here you can see this environment\'s parameters
No environment has been added yet
We can\'t store the current host, check all the params
Logs launched by the app are shown here
Aquí se muestra el token del dispositivo. Toque para copiar.
For your safety, and that of the driver, please help us verify your identity.
Take a quick photo of your ID so we can verify your identity.
Does your %s have this number area?
It could be on the front or back.
Position your %1s showing the front part with your photo
Position your %1s showing the reverse side with the number part
Sorry, something went wrong with your request.
Sorry, we couldn\'t detect any document. If you need a ride now, order using a different payment method
Sorry, something went wrong. \nWe weren\'t able to scan your identity document.
If you leave now, your payment method won\'t be saved.
Journeys paid for by your company
Don\'t forget to wear the helmet
You\'ll find it in the trunk
%s, do you want to activate camera permissions?
Do you want to allow camera permission?
To take photos and scan documents, we need access to your camera.
%s, do you want to activate gallery permissions?
Do you want to activate access to your gallery?
That way, you\'ll be able to choose a photo from the gallery to use as your profile pic.
%s, we need you to let us access your location.
We need you to let us access your location.
We\'ll only use it to find the nearest driver.
Your phone is denying permissions. You\'ll need to change this in your phone settings.
Is this your pick up point?
Where shall we pick you up?
You can adjust your position on the map
Sorry, Cabify isn\'t available in this area
Go back to my current location
The journey price has changed because the pick up point was modified
The price of your journey has changed
The journey price has changed due to an increase in demand
Feedback couldn\'t be sent, please try later
You haven’t gone anywhere with us yet.
Fancy exploring the city? We\'re ready to take you
The CO2 emissions from this journey will be offset by Cabify through protecting trees in the Amazon rainforest.
Check the zone and your position
Register or login with your email
It can be personal or corporate
By continuing you accept our %1$s and the %2$s
Almost done! You just need to enter the 4 digit code we\'ve sent to %1$s
Hmm, it seems something went wrong generating your code. Please try again
Sorry, there was a connection error. Please try again.
We\'ll send you a new code and invalidate the previous one. Are you sure?
It\'ll just take a few seconds
Nice one, %1s!\nYour account has been created
To ride with us, you need to add a payment method. You can do it now or leave it for later.
The phone number is already registered
Log in with another email or try another phone number
Do you want the driver to call you?
Should the driver open the door?
How do you like the A/C?
Notifications about your trips on Cabify
We couldn\'t find a driver near %1$s
Your driver is waiting for you at %1$s
Your driver is waiting for you
Your driver canceled the journey from %1$s
Your driver canceled the journey to %1$s
Move the marker to set the %s
You\'re still moving forward in the queue but we need a bit more time to find you a driver.
%1s, in order to offer you better services, we need you to activate your localization permits.
%1s, to offer you the best possible service we need you to turn on your phone\'s GPS
Where do you want to go?
We weren\'t able to save your info
You\'re about to leave this screen without saving the changes. Are you sure?
Update your profile pic. Check your hair, strike a pose and...
Sorry, there was an error with the pic you selected. Please try again.
We weren\'t able to validate your phone number.
I\'m in an emergency situation and I need immediate help. I\'m %1$s and I\'m in a Cabify, %2$s %3$s with the driver %4$s. See my exact location and route at %5$s
Sorry! Something went wrong and we couldn\'t process the booking
Please choose a valid payment method in order to ride with Movo
Sorry, this vehicle\'s been reserved by someone else. Please try a different one.
You can\'t book this vehicle because you\'ve already got a journey active
If you need, here you can include extra info (exact location, details of other passenger, etc)
We couldn\'t retrieve your payment methods
We couldn\'t update the current payment method
We couldn\'t delete the payment method
You\'re going to delete the payment method %1$s. Are you sure?
You need to have a payment method active before ordering a journey.
Choose how you want to pay
Make sure the card details are correct and try again
The 3 or 4 digit number found on the back of your card
It\'ll just take a few seconds...
Sorry, something went wrong. Try again.
It will take just a few seconds
We couldn\'t verify your document. You can try again or wait for us to review it in the next 48 hours.
You\'re about to exit this process without adding a payment method.
It\'ll just take a few seconds...
Take a photo of your licence and in just 3 minutes you\'ll be able to start driving
Put your license in the frame and wait for it to be scanned automatically.
Why can\'t I find my country?
For legal reasons, we only except driving licenses issued in certain countries. If your country isn\'t on the list, unfortunately you won\'t be able to drive a Movo.
You\'ve correctly selected the country that issued your license
Your license\'s photo of you is clearly visible
Your document is a valid, unexpired driving license
What kind of ride do you want?
You\'re about to cancel this reservation… are you sure?
Ah… seems like something went wrong loading our vehicles.
We\'re sorry. You can\'t order Cabify with this account right now
No Cabify available. Sorry, we can\'t offer you any vehicles at that time.
Reservations only. In this area we don\'t have immediate pick up. You\'ll need to make a reservation.
We\'re not receiving your device\'s location and so we can\'t create this journey
Are you sure you want to cancel your reservation?
Select another vehicle on the map to make a new booking
We need you to update Google Play Services to use Cabify. Please go back and update.
Connecting with the best driver for your location
You\'re moving forward in the queue
We\'ll send you a notification when we find you a driver
It\'s free to cancel right now.
Are you sure you want to cancel?
You can cancel without charge but you\'ll lose your place in the queue.
Waiting for %1$s to accept the journey.
You don’t have any rides planned.
Here’s where you can keep track of all active journeys and reservations.
We\'ve created your account using data from Easy.
You already have an active journey
Are you sure you want to create a new journey?
Select a vehicle from the map or go find one and scan its QR code
Please tell us why you canceled your journey.
Choose a friend or relative who you’d like to share your journey information with. We’ll send them text messages to keep them updated throughout your trip.
You\'re about to delete your trusted contact
Sorry, something went wrong. Try again.
Done! Your contact will be kept updated during your journeys.
So you can ride, we need you to choose a payment method.
It\'s a surchage that applies when lots of our users are ordering journeys at the same time. In this way, we minimize the time you have to wait when you need a ride.
The CO2 emissions from this journey will be offset by Cabify through protecting trees in the Amazon rainforest.
For legal reasons, we need to know the number of your national identity document or passport.
You\'ll find it on the side of the vehicle
You\'ll find it on the side of the vehicle
We\'re ready to go. Are you?
